Package inra.ijpb.binary.geodesic

Class GeodesicDistanceTransform3DFloat

java.lang.Object
inra.ijpb.algo.AlgoStub
inra.ijpb.binary.geodesic.GeodesicDistanceTransform3DFloat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Algo, GeodesicDistanceTransform3D
public class GeodesicDistanceTransform3DFloat
extends AlgoStub
implements GeodesicDistanceTransform3D
Computation of geodesic distance transform for 3D images, using floating point computation. Adapted for the management of label images.
Author:
dlegland
